amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 118-12 to provide that nothing in the Act, or the amendments made by this Act, should be construed as authorizing or granting parents the ability to deny any student who is not their own child from accessing any books or other reading materials otherwise available from.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garbarino amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Garbarino.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garbarino amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
